channel.title: Comments on: Commercial HotSpot services – a mini-survey
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Wi-Fi Networking News

item.description:
<strong>Field Report: Denmark to Vienna</strong>
Tomas Krag writes of his trip from Denmark to Vienna with a Tungsten C: Service was available, but annoying to access and use....
item.content:encoded:
Field Report: Denmark to Vienna

Tomas Krag writes of his trip from Denmark to Vienna with a Tungsten C: Service was available, but annoying to access and use….
